title: Parliament Budget Session 2022 Live Updates: If Cong wasn’t there, Emergency, Sikh riots, Kashmiri Pandits exodus wouldn’t have happened, says PM Modi - The Indian Express
content:
1. Parliament Budget Session 2022 Live Updates: If Cong wasn’t there, Emergency, Sikh riots, Kashmiri Pandits exodus wouldn’t have happened, says PM Modi  The Indian Express
  2. "Congress Leader Of 'Tukde-Tukde' Gang": PM's All-Out Attack In Parliament  NDTV
  3. PM Modi: 'If there was no Congress...': PM Modi attacks grand old party in Rajya Sabha | India News  Times of India
  4. PM Modi cites Nehru in response to oppn on inflation  Daijiworld.com
  5. "If There Were No Congress..." PM Continues Attack In Parliament  NDTV
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Budget Session 2022 India, Parliament LIVE Updates, 8 February: PM Modi launched another blistering attack on the Congress on Tuesday as he accused the opposition party of destabilising state governments, corruption, putting a family’s interests over that of everyone else.
